articles.author: Michael Casagrande | mcasagrande@al.com
articles.title: Casagrande: A new day at Saban's old podium, what was missing - AL.com
articles.description: Kalen DeBoer coached his first Alabama football practice Monday before stepping to the podium that became famous for his predecessor's rants. Another new day greeted that new dynamic.
articles.content:
This is an opinion column.
Wearing a hoodie, ball cap Kalen DeBoer stepped to the podium.
He smiled. A real one and his first Alabama post-practice news conference was off to a delightful start.
